name: Thomas D. GOODENOW, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Goodenow v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Thomas D. GOODENOW, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 29th day of September, 2015, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

123 A.3d 325
Thomas D. GOODENOW, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.
